sources.title: The Sandwich Man
sources.description: Title: The Sandwich Man Summary: A man with a sandwich-board (advert) wanders around London meeting many strange characters. Directed by: Robert Hartford-Davis Actors: Michael Bentine, Dora Bryan, Harry H. Corbett Production Company: The Rank Organisation Release Date: 15 July 1966 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 A man with a sandwich-board (advert) wanders around London meeting many strange characters.

metadata.Plot: A man with a sandwich-board (advert) wanders around London meeting many strange characters.
metadata.Actors: Michael Bentine, Dora Bryan, Harry H. Corbett
